{"id":1320261578,"question_id":3494,"lang":"rust","lang_name":"Rust","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1720925646,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1320261578/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost for Cutting Cake I","memory":"N/A","code":"impl Solution {\n    pub fn minimum_cost(m: i32, n: i32, horizontal_cut: Vec<i32>, vertical_cut: Vec<i32>) -> i32 {\n        let mut h_cut = horizontal_cut;\n        let mut v_cut = vertical_cut;\n        \n        h_cut.sort_unstable();\n        v_cut.sort_unstable();\n        \n        let mut h_idx = 0;\n        let mut v_idx = 0;\n        let mut h_pieces = 1;\n        let mut v_pieces = 1;\n        let mut total_cost = 0;\n        \n        while h_idx < h_cut.len() && v_idx < v_cut.len() {\n            if h_cut[h_idx] < v_cut[v_idx] {\n                total_cost += h_cut[h_idx] * v_pieces;\n                h_pieces += 1;\n                h_idx += 1;\n            } else {\n                total_cost += v_cut[v_idx] * h_pieces;\n                v_pieces += 1;\n                v_idx += 1;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        while h_idx < h_cut.len() {\n            total_cost += h_cut[h_idx] * v_pieces;\n            h_idx += 1;\n        }\n        \n        while v_idx < v_cut.len() {\n            total_cost += v_cut[v_idx] * h_pieces;\n            v_idx += 1;\n        }\n        \n        total_cost\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-for-cutting-cake-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
